Cosori Air Fryer Review

Compact air fryer with fast heat-up and easy presets.

Check price View on Amazon

Quick verdict

Cosori Air Fryer is best for Small households who want quick weeknight meals. It stands out for Strong performance in a compact footprint, but may not suit buyers who need Large families.

Specs

Capacity 5.8 qt
Power 1700 W
Dimensions 11.8 x 14.7 x 12.0 in
Warranty 1 year
Noise level Moderate

Pros

  • Fast preheat
  • Simple controls
  • Even cooking

Cons

  • Limited basket size
  • Noisy fan

Alternatives

Ninja AF101

Great crisping at a lower price point

Ready to buy?

FAQ

Is the Cosori Air Fryer easy to clean?
Yes, the basket is nonstick and the removable parts are dishwasher safe.
